mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repair(owner_id, content, image, status, create_time) VALUES(#{ownerId}, #{content}, #{image}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE repair SET status = #{status}, finish_time = #{finishTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, o.name as ownerName FROM repair r LEFT JOIN owner o ON r.owner_id = o.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
